channel.title: Pytorch on Hank Tech Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Pytorch on Hank Tech Lab

item.title: SwinIR Experiment Summary â€” March 31, 2025
item.description: ðŸ§ª SwinIR Experiment Summary â€” March 31, 2025 1. Environment Setup OS: Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS (noble) lsb_release -a Python: 3.12.3 python3 --version GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Driver: 570.124.06 CUDA: 12.8 nvidia-smi PyTorch: 2.5.1+cu121 CUDA Available: True import torch print(torch.__version__) print(torch.cuda.is_available()) 2. Project Setup Install Python venv and create environment: sudo apt install python3.12-venv python3 -m venv ~/venvs/swinir source ~/venvs/swinir/bin/activate Install PyTorch (CUDA 12.1): pip install torch torchvision --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121 Clone SwinIR repo and install dependencies: git clone https://github.
